availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James W. Turner (Union County, Tennessee, farmer)

body.p: Union County, Tennessee, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Nancy Turner. Father of Malinda Turner, Sarah Turner, William M. Turner, Lewis G. Turner, Ruthy Turner, James Turner, Henry Turner, Nancy Turner, Laird turner, Parley Turner, John Turner, Rufus Turner, Manda J. Turner, and Price J. Turner. Farmer in Anderson County, Tennessee in 1850. Farmer in Union County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Anderson County, Subdivision 16, p. 52B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County, District 6, p. 458.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Union County,District 7, p. 256B.
Find A Grave, "James W. Turner (Jan. 20, 1805-Dec. 18, 1882)," Memorial #21533256, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/21533256 (accessed January 42, 2020).
